tasks.test:browser: git grep --name-only "This module is browser compatible." | grep -v deno.json | grep -v .github/workflows | grep -v _tools | xargs deno check --config browser-compat.tsconfig.json
tasks.lint: deno lint && deno fmt --check && deno task fmt:licence-headers --check && deno task lint:deprecations && deno task lint:doc-imports && deno task lint:check-assertions
tasks.pre-commit: deno task lint && deno task test && deno task build
